text: Taiwan (governed by the Republic of China) competed at the 1964 Summer Olympics in Tokyo, Japan. 40 competitors, 37 men and 3 women, took part in 46 events in 7 sports. In subsequent years pressure from the People’s Republic of China on sports organizations has caused Taiwan to compete as Chinese Taipei. ==Athletics== ==Boxing== ==Cycling== Four cyclists represented Taiwan in 1964. ;Individual road race * Her Jong-chau * Shue Ming-shu * Deng Chueng-hwai ;Team time trial * Deng Chueng-hwai * Her Jong-chau * Shue Ming-shu * Yang Rong-hwa ;1000m time trial * Shue Ming-shu ==Gymnastics== ==Judo== ==Shooting== Six shooters represented Taiwan in 1964. ;25 m pistol * Ma Chen-shan ;300 m rifle, three positions * Wu Tao-yan ;50 m rifle, three positions * Wu Tao-yan ;50 m rifle, prone * Pan Kou-ang * Tai Chao-chih ;Trap * Lin Ho-ming * Lin Wen-chu ==Weightlifting== ==Notes== ==References== ==External links== *Official Olympic Reports * * * * Category:Nations at the 1964 Summer Olympics 1964 1964 Category:1964 in Taiwanese sport
title: Taiwan at the 1964 Summer Olympics
